abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Yuzo Harada at
            the meeting of July 12, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report, the Programmatic
            Financial and Public Sector Adjustment Loan, and the
            Agricultural Reform Implementation Project for Turkey.
